content: garland cowl was designed with my beautiful daughter in mind her special present this cowl has a wonderful drape it is long enough to be worn long or twisted & looped mom yarn approximately 200 yards of aran or worsted weight yarn fiber or fiber mix that offers drape is recommended needles us size 10 5 6 5mm 29 inch circular gauge 4 4 5 stitches per inch using garter size 7 5 wide / 60 long blocked note blocking is essential to lenthen or shorten cowl you will want to increase/decrease by multiples of 14 to stay in pattern notions darning needle optional row counter pattern notes **stretchy cast on and bind off is recommended i used jeny s stretch cast on two needle method here is link to helpful video http //www youtube com/watch v=0pjmml9demc my personal choice for stretchy bnid-off is the elizabeth zimmerman sewn bind-off http //www youtube com/watch v=mfnavsy2rug **cowl is knit in the round and there is no seaming required **be sure and block your cowl blocking shows off the wonderful lacy pattern 1 e g a p ©2013 galzanne knits all rights reserved for private use only abbreviations st s stitch k knit p purl yo yarn over k2tog knit 2 sts together sl slip_stitch ssk slip slip knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together psso pass slip_stitch over rs right side ws wrong side pattern cast on 126 sts join in the round taking care not to twist your stitches round 1 knit round 2 purl round 3 knit round 4 purl round 5 knit round 6 yo k2tog repeat around round 7 knit round 8 purl round 9 knit round 10 -
